about_the_game:
Online PvP where you create a team of adorable characters to battle against... other adorable characters!

- No turn timer (async multiplayer) Start and stop the game at your convenience, returning when ready to continue the adventure.

- Make the characters more powerful and adorable by combining to evolve

- Select spells and collect relics to build synergy

- The cost of characters changes as players around the world shift the meta. Everyone buying bunnies?? Bunnies will automatically cost more! Enjoy an auto-balancing, meta destroying, anti-netdecking sytem that keeps the game fresh

(coming soon) Construct your initial deck from an army of characters, balancing their synergy.
(coming soon) Coop to build teams with friends and live matches to face the same opponent until the bitter, but adorable, end!
